sections.title: Getting Started
paragraphs: Create an account or use Guest Mode to start tracking your expenses immediately. Simply click 'Add Transaction' to record your first income or expense.

sections.title: Managing Transactions
paragraphs: You can add, edit, and delete transactions at any time. Use categories, dates, and descriptions to organize your financial data effectively.

sections.title: Budget Alerts
paragraphs: Set budget limits for different categories in your Settings. Finora will alert you when your spending approaches your defined limits.

sections.title: Exporting Data
paragraphs: Export your financial data as PDF or CSV from the Settings page. Reports can be filtered by date range and category.

sections.title: Need More Help?
paragraphs: If you can't find the answer you're looking for, please don't hesitate to contact us at info@finora.dawoddev.com.

questions.question: Is Finora really free?
questions.answer: Yes! Finora is 100% free — both Guest Mode and Full Access with a registered account.

questions.question: Do I need to create an account?
questions.answer: No. You can use Finora in Guest Mode without registration. However, creating a free account gives you cloud storage, data backup, and access from any device.

questions.question: Is my financial data secure?
questions.answer: Yes. All data is encrypted and stored securely. We use industry-standard security practices and never share your data with third parties.

questions.question: Which languages are supported?
questions.answer: Finora currently supports English, German, Arabic (RTL), and Georgian.

questions.question: Can I export my data?
questions.answer: Yes. You can export your financial data as PDF or CSV from the Settings page.

questions.question: How do I contact support?
questions.answer: You can reach us at info@finora.dawoddev.com or use the contact form on our Contact page.
